Author: A Human on TV
Description:
What if Clone drone had stuff that you want?
Version 0.2.12.0 changelog:
- The main addition is weapon skins! There are 110+ skins to equip
Note: Everyone with this mod can see your skins in multiplayer.
- Reworked mod framework. The mod is being prepared for upcoming major updates
- Removed all unused assets. Now the mod weights 10 megabytes, instead of 40...
- Graphics optimization. This mod should work better on low-end PCs
